hero.title: Hi, I'm
hero.summary: A passionate Full Stack Developer with 6+ years of experience in design, development, testing, deployment and maintenance of software systems. Equipped with a diverse and up-to-date skill-set. Proficient in various platforms, languages, and embedded systems. Experienced with the latest development tools, paradigms and technologies. Able to effectively produce solutions for complex problems independently, as well as collaborate as part ofa productive team.
hero.p0: Full-stack ninja, web and mobile develope. I'm a self-taught developer who loves to build things for the web.
hero.des0: I am a rising senior at Nazarbayev University majoring in CS.
hero.des1: I enjoy creating high-quality software products with a complex logic behind it.
hero.des2: My technology stack includes NodeJs, TypeScript, React, React-Native, Java, MongoDB, Swift and Kotlin.
hero.des3: I am also currently learning more about AI security and cybersecurity.
